article.title: North Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the North Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
North Texas Office

North Texas USEAC

4300 Amon Carter Boulevard, Suite 114

Fort Worth, Texas 76155

Phone 817-684-5347

Fax 817-684-5345
Email:Office.NorthTexas@trade.gov

North Texas Staff

Daniel Swart

Office Director
Direct dial: 817-684-5355
Fax: 817-684-5355
Email:Daniel.Swart@trade.gov
Industries: Advanced manufacturing, automotive and ground transportation, processed controls, machine tools

Elizabeth Graham

Senior International Trade Specialist
Ph: 817-684-5350
Fax: 817-684-5345
Email:Elizabeth.Graham@trade.gov
Industries: Telecommunications equipment and services, Safety and Security equipment and services, Service Industries -- accounting, advertising, financial, franchising, insurance, investment, management, leasing, employment, general legal, maintenance

Greg Thompson

Senior International Trade Specialist
Ph: 214-712-1932

Fax: 214-746-6799
Email:Greg.Thompson@trade.gov
Industries: HVAC, building and construction equipment, education and training services,

David Royce

Senior International Trade Specialist
Ph: 817-684-5354
Fax: 817-684-5345
Email:David.Royce@trade.gov
Industries: Agribusiness, Information Technology, Foods, Beverages, Food Processing and Packaging Equipment, Hotel and Restaurant Equipment

Richard Ryan

Senior International Trade Specialist
Ph: 817-684-5352
Fax: 817-684-5345
Email:Richard.Ryan@trade.gov
Industries: Energy (oil and gas, alternative energy), pumps/valves/compressors, Chemicals, Plastics and Rubber , Healthcare/Nutritional Supplements

Kenneth Haynes

International Trade Specialist
Ph:817-684-5348

Fax: 817-684-5345
Email:Kenneth.Haynes​@trade.gov
Industries: Electronics, Consumer Goods, Environmental Technologies

Matt Baker

International Trade Specialist

Ph:817-684-5349

Fax: 817-684-5345

Email: Matt.Baker@trade.gov

Richard Schulze, Small Business Administration (SBA)

Regional Manager -International Trade Program
Ph: 817-310-3749
Fax: 817-310-3757
Email:Richard.Schulze@SBA.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

​
article.seometadatatitle: North Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.seometadatadescription: Contact the North Texas U.S. Export Assistance Center.
